title: 微软 Office 漏洞允许攻击者执行远程代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office bug allows the assailant to execute remote code
summary: Several key loopholes in Microsoft Office allow attackers to enforce random codes on affected systems, affecting numerous versions of Windows, Mac and Android platforms.

title: 微软修补被阿联酋黑客利用的零日漏洞
title_translated: Microsoft fixes the zero-day loophole used by UAE hackers.
summary: Microsoft closed a zero-day loophole in its Web application framework, which was exploited by Emirates Threat organizations as part of a spying campaign. The loophole was tracked as CVE-2025-33053 and affected Turkey, Qatar, Egypt, and Yemen.

title: Microsoft Office: CVE-2025-53784: Microsoft Word: CVE-2025-53784
title_translated: Microsoft Office: CVE-2025-53784: Microsoft Word: CVE-2025-53784
